channel.title: How do I add a program to my client?
channel.description: Hi, I have this skill calculator that I downloaded that I wanted to add to my client. It's saved in: Start>All Programs>Accessories. It's called "skill calculator". I wanna add a button to my click where you click it and it pops up. How do I do that? Please include a step-by-step instruction.

item.title: How do I add a program to my client?
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

Hi, I have this skill calculator that I downloaded that I wanted to add to my client. It’s saved in: Start>All Programs>Accessories. It’s called “skill calculator”. I wanna add a button to my click where you click it and it pops up. How do I do that? Please include a step-by-step instruction.

Read full topic
